nodes.text: Moss chips were a crispy snack. During the final years of the Galactic Republic, they were popular in the Core Worlds region of the galaxy. Around 21 BBY, moss chips were eaten by clone commando Niner Skirata while he was visiting the Human Besany Wennen.

Moss chips first appeared in the 2007 novel Republic Commando: True Colors, written by Karen Traviss. While at one point in the novel, it is stated that the chips were served on a plate, a separate sentence maintains that they were served in a bowl.
